properties.name: app.auth.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens.

properties.name: app.auth.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.auth.jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.video.upload.location
properties.description: Location where uploaded videos will be stored.

properties.name: app.video.upload.max-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed size for video uploads.

properties.name: app.video.processing.url
properties.description: URL for the video processing service.

properties.name: rabbitmq.exchange.video-processing
properties.description: RabbitMQ exchange name for video processing.

properties.name: rabbitmq.queue.video-processing
properties.description: RabbitMQ queue name for video processing.

properties.name: rabbitmq.queue.video-result
properties.description: RabbitMQ queue name for video processing results.

properties.name: rabbitmq.routing-key.video-processing
properties.description: RabbitMQ routing key for video processing.

properties.name: rabbitmq.routing-key.video-result
properties.description: RabbitMQ routing key for video processing results.
